sn55.23:3.1: 23. Godhasakkasutta
sn55.23:4.2: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena godhā sakko tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.23:4.4: “katihi tvaṃ, godhe, dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāsi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇan”ti?
sn55.23:5.1: “Tīhi khvāhaṃ, mahānāma, dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇaṃ.
sn55.23:5.3: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.23:5.10: Imehi khvāhaṃ, mahānāma, tīhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇaṃ.
sn55.23:6.1: Tvaṃ pana, mahānāma, katihi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāsi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇan”ti?
sn55.23:6.2: “Catūhi khvāhaṃ, godhe, dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇaṃ.
sn55.23:6.4: Idha, godhe, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.23:6.9: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.23:6.11: Imehi khvāhaṃ, godhe, catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇan”ti.
sn55.23:7.2: Bhagavāva etaṃ jāneyya etehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ vā asamannāgataṃ vā”ti.
sn55.23:7.5: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko godhā ca sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn55.23:7.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.23:8.3: ‘katihi tvaṃ, godhe, dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāsi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇaṃ’?
sn55.23:8.4: Evaṃ vutte, bhante, godhā sakko maṃ etadavoca—
sn55.23:9.1: Tīhi khvāhaṃ, mahānāma, dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇaṃ.
sn55.23:9.3: Idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.23:9.10: Imehi khvāhaṃ, mahānāma, tīhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇaṃ.
sn55.23:9.11: Tvaṃ pana, mahānāma, katamehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāsi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇan’ti?
sn55.23:10.1: Evaṃ vuttāhaṃ, bhante, godhaṃ sakkaṃ etadavocaṃ:
sn55.23:10.2: ‘catūhi khvāhaṃ, godhe, dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇaṃ.
sn55.23:10.4: Idha, godhe, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.23:10.9: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.23:10.11: Imehi khvāhaṃ, godhe, catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ sotāpannapuggalaṃ ājānāmi avinipātadhammaṃ niyataṃ sambodhiparāyaṇan’ti.
sn55.23:11.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhante, godhā sakko maṃ etadavoca:
sn55.23:11.3: Bhagavāva etaṃ jāneyya etehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ vā asamannāgataṃ vā’ti.
sn55.23:11.4: Idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppādo uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho ca.
sn55.23:11.6: Evaṃ pasannaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu.
sn55.23:11.7: Idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppādo uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhunisaṅgho ca.
sn55.23:11.9: Evaṃ pasannaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu.
sn55.23:11.10: Idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppādo uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhunisaṅgho ca upāsakā ca.
sn55.23:11.12: Evaṃ pasannaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu.
sn55.23:11.13: Idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppādo uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhunisaṅgho upāsakā upāsikāyo ca.
sn55.23:11.15: Evaṃ pasannaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretu.
sn55.23:11.16: Idha, bhante, kocideva dhammo samuppādo uppajjeyya, ekato assa bhagavā ekato bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhunisaṅgho upāsakā upāsikāyo sadevako ca loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā.
sn55.23:11.18: Evaṃ pasannaṃ maṃ, bhante, bhagavā dhāretū”ti.
sn55.23:11.19: “Evaṃvādī tvaṃ, godhe, mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ kiṃ vadesī”ti?
sn55.23:11.20: “Evaṃvādāhaṃ, bhante, mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ na kiñci vadāmi, aññatra kalyāṇā aññatra kusalā”ti.
